snippet: In each of the last two seasons, the Mets carried a winning record through the All-Star break only to fall apart later in the season.
abstract: New York Mets, preparing to face the Atlanta Braves, hope to avoid another second-half letdown.
lead_paragraph: In each of the last two seasons, the Mets carried a winning record through the All-Star break only to fall apart later in the season.

headline.seo: The Mets Hope to Avoid Another Second-Half Letdown
